name: mad-atlas
description: Pre-built TopoJSON from the Madrid City Council

scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../martgnz.github.io && git pull && cp -v ../mad-atlas/mad/census_tracts.json mad-census_tracts.v1.json && git add mad-census_tracts.v1.json && git commit -m "mad-atlas ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd -

author: Martín González (https://martingonzalez.net)
